description: This table has, for this imaging order, the image availability information for each of the image archives from which you receive Image Availability Notifications.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMAGE_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The server name category ID that store images for the imaging order.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: IMG_AVAIL_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether images are available at this location. 'Y' indicates that images are available. 'N' or NULL indicates that images are not available.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: IMG_AVAIL_DTTM
columns.description: The updated date and time of the image availability information for the related image storage location.
